content: Courses: Data Structures, OOP, Algorithms, Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Artificial Intelligence, UI/UX

description: Developed 8+ functioning web applications using HTML, CSS, React, Redux, NextJS, and Javascript from scratch.
Took responsibility of more than 15 projects - Including the existing projects & UI/UX designs.
Frequent communication with clients, understanding their needs and preferences, and accordingly building projects on that basis was my major part of the work.

Designed the User Interface of the admin dashboard: First analyzed the premier version (product) of the app, accordingly built the UI/UX for the employees in Dusminute for analyzing the data of premier member(customer).
Designed and delivered graphic posters and banners for Dusminute's customers (retail shops).
Mainly Worked and attended meeting with Developer, Co-Founder & CTO of Dusminute.
Worked with 40+ clients (globally) and delivered high-quality designs.
Been a part of an Early stage Startup: Worked on the enhancement of the web application.
Got 25+ offers to join as an intern.

blog.title: Contribute to Open Source Projects with ease
